readable.title: 2695085862_2ed62df354
readable.content: A bearded man with a Mohawk and skull bandanna . A man with a hankerchief on his next and pierced ears looks off into the distance . a man with a pierced ear is wearing a black shirt . A man with a pompadour haircut and beard wearing a bandanna around his neck . The man has a black and white scarf around his neck .
